title: Processing a Series of Items with Iterators
description: In this lab, we will explore how to process a series of items using iterators, which are lazy and allow us to iterate over a sequence of items without having to reimplement the logic ourselves.

meta.title: Processing a Series of Items with Iterators | Rust Programming
meta.description: Learn how to process a series of items using iterators in Rust, a powerful and efficient programming language.
meta.keywords: Rust, Iterators, Processing, Series, Items, Programming, Tutorials
